title: The Little Mermaid
short_plot_summary: A mermaid named Ariel dreams of becoming human, makes a deal with Ursula the sea witch, and tries to win the love of Prince Eric in order to remain human.
explanation: A mermaid, representing Ariel, the main character of the story
A crab, symbolizing Sebastian, Ariel's crab friend and adviser
A fish, representing Ariel's fish friend, Flounder
A prince, signifying Prince Eric, the human Ariel falls in love with
A castle, depicting the human world Ariel longs to join
